INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, SYSDATE, NULL, DEFAULT)

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, '부서없음') DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_ID = ?
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMAIL = ?, PHONE =?, SALARY =?, BONUS =? WHERE EMP_ID = ?

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, '부서없음') DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE DEPT_TITLE = ?

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, '부서없음') DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE SALARY > ?
SELECT NVL(DEPT_CODE, '부서없음') DEPT_CODE, SUM(SALARY) SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_ID = DEPT_CODE) GROUP BY DEPT_CODE ORDER BY DEPT_CODE

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, '부서없음') DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_NO = ?
SELECT JOB_NAME, ROUND(AVG(SALARY),1) SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) GROUP BY JOB_CODE, JOB_NAME ORDER BY JOB_CODE

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, '부서없음') DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_ID = (SELECT MANAGER_ID FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_ID = ? )
SELECT NVL(DEPT_TITLE, '부서없음') DEPT_TITLE, ROUND(AVG(SALARY), 1) SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_ID = DEPT_CODE) GROUP BY DEPT_TITLE, DEPT_CODE ORDER BY DEPT_CODE

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, '부서없음') DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_ID = DEPT_CODE) JOIN LOCATION ON (LOCAL_CODE = LOCATION_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE LOCATION_ID = (SELECT LOCATION_ID FROM LOCATION JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (LOCATION_ID = LOCAL_CODE) JOIN EMPLOYEE ON (DEPT_ID = DEPT_CODE) WHERE EMP_NAME = ?)

SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, NVL(DEPT_TITLE, '부서없음') DEPT_TITLE, JOB_NAME, SALARY FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON(DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) WHERE EMP_NAME IN (SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE JOB_NAME = ?)
